
# xdg_mime_applications


## Config File Path

* [~/.config/mimeapps.list](config/xdg-mime-applications/mimeapps.list)
* [/usr/share/applications/mimeapps.list](config/xdg-mime-applications/mimeapps.list)

## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
